# Boredom at Work

> A blog for office workers who want to learn productively during work hours. Topics include AI skills, 3D printing, photography, importing from Japan, and tech gadgets. The site helps readers turn downtime into career advancement.

## About

Boredom at Work (https://boredom-at-work.com) provides practical guides and tutorials for people stuck in boring meetings or with downtime at the office. Instead of mindlessly scrolling, readers can learn AI skills, earn certifications, research tech purchases, or explore new hobbies.

Target audience: Office workers, remote employees, and anyone looking to make productive use of their work downtime.

## Categories

### AI & Learning
Guides for learning AI skills and earning certifications during work hours.

- [**AI Tools Guide (Hub)**](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-tools-guide/): Complete guide to AI tools for work — ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Copilot and more
- [**Learn AI Guide (Hub)**](https://boredom-at-work.com/learn-ai-guide/): Step-by-step roadmap to learn AI in 2026 — from beginner to job-ready
- [**ChatGPT Mastery Guide (Hub)**](https://boredom-at-work.com/chatgpt-guide/): Everything about ChatGPT — prompts, custom instructions, workflows, tips
- [Best Free AI Courses](https://boredom-at-work.com/best-free-ai-courses/): Curated list of free AI courses you can take discreetly at work
- [Google AI Essentials Review](https://boredom-at-work.com/google-ai-essentials-review/): In-depth review of Google's AI certification
- [Best AI Courses on Coursera](https://boredom-at-work.com/best-ai-courses-coursera/): Top Coursera courses for AI learning
- [ChatGPT Tutorial for Beginners](https://boredom-at-work.com/chatgpt-tutorial-beginners/): Complete beginner guide to using ChatGPT effectively
- [Learn Prompt Engineering in One Afternoon](https://boredom-at-work.com/prompt-engineering-afternoon/): Quick guide to prompt engineering basics
- [AI Certifications You Can Earn in a Week](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-certifications-in-a-week/): Fast-track certifications for your resume
- [AI Skills That Will Get You Promoted](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-skills-for-promotion/): Career-boosting AI skills
- [Claude vs ChatGPT](https://boredom-at-work.com/claude-vs-chatgpt/): AI assistant comparison guide
- [Claude AI Review](https://boredom-at-work.com/claude-ai-review/): In-depth review — what Claude does better than ChatGPT
- [ChatGPT Alternatives](https://boredom-at-work.com/chatgpt-alternatives/): 10 best alternatives — Claude, Gemini, Perplexity, Copilot and more
- [ChatGPT Plus vs Free](https://boredom-at-work.com/chatgpt-plus-vs-free/): Is $20/month worth it? Honest comparison
- [Google Gemini Review](https://boredom-at-work.com/google-gemini-review/): Is it better than ChatGPT? Honest review
- [ChatGPT for Excel](https://boredom-at-work.com/chatgpt-for-excel/): Write formulas, analyze data, automate tasks
- [ChatGPT Custom Instructions](https://boredom-at-work.com/chatgpt-custom-instructions/): Set up once, get better responses forever
- [AI Presentation Makers](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-presentation-makers/): Gamma, Tome, Beautiful.ai and more compared
- [Perplexity AI Guide](https://boredom-at-work.com/perplexity-ai-guide/): AI-powered search engine for research
- [Best AI Tools for Office Work](https://boredom-at-work.com/best-ai-tools-office-work/): Curated productivity tools for work
- [Microsoft Copilot Review](https://boredom-at-work.com/microsoft-copilot-review/): Is $30/month worth it?
- [AI Meeting Assistants](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-meeting-assistants/): Otter, Fireflies, Granola compared
- [Notion AI vs Obsidian AI](https://boredom-at-work.com/notion-ai-vs-obsidian-ai/): Note-taking apps with AI compared
- [How to Use AI at Work Safely](https://boredom-at-work.com/how-to-use-ai-at-work-safely/): Policies, privacy, and best practices
- [AI Writing Tools Comparison](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-writing-tools-comparison/): Grammarly, Jasper, Claude compared
- [AI for Email Writing](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-email-writing/): Templates, prompts, and tools for faster emails
- [AI PDF Summarizers](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-pdf-summarizers/): Chat with documents — ChatGPT, Claude, NotebookLM compared
- [Best AI Chrome Extensions](https://boredom-at-work.com/best-ai-chrome-extensions/): Browser extensions for productivity

### 3D Printing
Beginner guides for getting started with 3D printing.

- [3D Printing Beginner's Guide](https://boredom-at-work.com/3d-printing-beginners-guide/): Complete introduction to 3D printing
- [Is 3D Printing Worth It?](https://boredom-at-work.com/is-3d-printing-worth-it/): Cost-benefit analysis for beginners
- [Best 3D Printers Under $300](https://boredom-at-work.com/best-3d-printers-under-300/): Budget-friendly printer recommendations
- [Bambu A1 Mini vs Creality Ender 3](https://boredom-at-work.com/bambu-a1-mini-vs-creality-ender-3/): Popular printer comparison
- [What to 3D Print First](https://boredom-at-work.com/what-to-3d-print-first/): Project ideas for beginners
- [3D Printing Beginner Mistakes](https://boredom-at-work.com/3d-printing-beginner-mistakes/): Common errors and how to avoid them

### Photography
Camera guides and photography tips for beginners.

- [Best Cameras for Beginners](https://boredom-at-work.com/best-cameras-for-beginners/): Top camera recommendations for new photographers
- [Best Cameras Under $500](https://boredom-at-work.com/best-cameras-under-500/): Budget camera guide
- [DSLR vs Mirrorless for Beginners](https://boredom-at-work.com/dslr-vs-mirrorless-beginners/): Camera type comparison
- [Canon R100 vs Nikon Z50](https://boredom-at-work.com/canon-r100-vs-nikon-z50/): Entry-level mirrorless comparison
- [Camera vs Smartphone](https://boredom-at-work.com/camera-vs-smartphone/): When to use a dedicated camera
- [Beginner Photography Mistakes](https://boredom-at-work.com/beginner-photography-mistakes/): Common errors to avoid

### Japan Shopping
Guides for importing products from Japan.

- [How to Buy from Japan: Beginner Guide](https://boredom-at-work.com/how-to-buy-from-japan-beginners-guide/): Complete guide to Japanese proxy services
- [Buyee vs Sendico](https://boredom-at-work.com/buyee-vs-sendico-japan-proxy/): Comparison of popular proxy services
- [Best Japanese Products to Import](https://boredom-at-work.com/best-japanese-products-to-import/): Top items worth importing from Japan

### AI Travel Planning
Guides for planning trips with AI tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity.

- [AI Travel Planning Hub](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-travel-planning/): Complete guide to planning trips with AI (hub page)
- [Step-by-Step: Your First AI-Planned Trip](https://boredom-at-work.com/chatgpt-trip-planning-tutorial/): Beginner tutorial for planning trips with ChatGPT
- [ChatGPT Travel Prompts](https://boredom-at-work.com/chatgpt-travel-planning-prompts/): 19 prompts that actually work
- [Best AI Trip Planners 2026](https://boredom-at-work.com/best-ai-trip-planners/): 8 tools compared
- [AI Travel Planning Mistakes](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-travel-planning-mistakes/): 7 mistakes that ruin trips
- [Claude vs ChatGPT for Travel](https://boredom-at-work.com/claude-vs-chatgpt-travel-planning/): Which AI plans better trips?
- [Free AI Travel Tools](https://boredom-at-work.com/free-ai-travel-tools/): Plan trips without spending money
- [AI Packing Lists](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-packing-list-travel-checklist/): Never forget essentials
- [Gemini for Travel Planning](https://boredom-at-work.com/gemini-travel-planning/): Real-time travel info
- [Perplexity for Travel Research](https://boredom-at-work.com/perplexity-travel-research/): Research with sources
- [Build AI Flight Search Agent](https://boredom-at-work.com/build-ai-flight-search-agent/): Custom flight monitoring
- [AI Trip Planning: Japan](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-trip-planning-japan/): Complete Japan guide
- [AI Trip Planning: Vietnam](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-trip-planning-vietnam/): Complete Vietnam guide
- [AI Trip Planning: Cambodia](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-trip-planning-cambodia/): Complete Cambodia guide
- [Japan vs Vietnam vs Cambodia](https://boredom-at-work.com/japan-vietnam-cambodia-comparison/): Destination comparison
- [Malaysia Trip with ChatGPT](https://boredom-at-work.com/chatgpt-malaysia-trip-planning/): Real trip case study
- [Southeast Asia Trip Planning](https://boredom-at-work.com/ai-planning-southeast-asia-trip-2026/): Multi-country planning
